name: Nick, Edd and JR Swimming Pool
name_original: Nick, Edd and JR Swimming Pool
description:
Hello Kids, Are you ready for swimming pool party? Yes then Let's go to fun with crazy waterslide adventure. Here, Nick, edd and JR want to go outside for some awesome activities to make the vacation time memorable and exciting. In this swimming pool game, we included tons of different and interesting stores like food stall, drink stall, toy store and much more. In toys store, you can find a collection of water toys like water tube, boat and much more. During swimming, they will enjoy an amazing boat ride. After completing swimming, they have to eat some yummy and tasty food and drinks. Nick, Edd and JR swimming pool game is the best place to experience swimming and relax your body from all types of stress.

Features:

- Different tubes and boats are available
- Eat some healthy food
- Try different activities in a swimming pool
- Easy and learning swimming game
- Realistic physical control
- Have a fun with friends
